message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting strong, but I'm feeling greedy today!
You're being greedy, but I'll give you a slight edge!
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't think I'll give you all the power!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not giving up either! Let's find a reasonable split!
You're getting closer to the edge, but I'm still not budging!
I'm not backing down! This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're running out of options, and I'm running out of patience!
This is my last stand! Take this or we both get nothing!
It's now or never, Alice. Take the last crumbs or walk away with nothing!
